content:
* Experience with SQL, Python, and other programming languages for data analysis and visualization.
* Strong knowledge of Tableau and Excel for creating and interpreting data visualizations.
* Familiarity with APIs and experience working with data from different platforms.
* Detail-oriented and organized approach to data analysis and project management.
* Passion for music and the music industry, with an in-depth understanding of current trends and shifts in the industry.
* Experience working on custom projects for a department, specifically analyzing the value of playlisting and its impact on song success.
* Experience with Hi-level playlist tracking, TikTok tracking, social listening, and RIAA certifications research.
* Proven ability to work in a fast-paced and dynamic environment, collaborating with different departments and stakeholders.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to identify and analyze trends and shifts in the music industry.
* Experience in data visualization and able to communicate data insights to non-technical stakeholders.
* Strong organizational and time management skills, able to prioritize and meet deadlines.
* Strong communication skills, able to clearly and effectively communicate data insights and recommendations.
* Strong interest in music and the music industry and eagerness to learn about the industry trends and data.
